document_data.caption: Rare faceted hypersthene.
document_data.name: Hypersthene
document_data.mainbody: '''Hypersthene''', also known as '''[[wikipedia:en:bronzite|bronzite]]''', was a [[gem|gemstone]] usually cut [[wikipedia:cabochon|cabochon]].
document_data.Description: This [[Semi-precious stones|semi-precious stone]] was brown and opaque (sometimes reddish or greenish) and contained silvery spangles. It was rare to find an unflawed piece larger than {{frac|1|2}} in (13 mm) across, and as a result the stone yielded small gemstones. A typical stone had a base value of 50 gp.
document_data.Powers: Carrying or wearing one of these gemstones made the bearer undetectable by the ''[[wyvern watch]]'' spell. In common parlance this property was known as wyvern warding.
